1406300.name: Fantasy Grounds - Silly Goblins
1406300.description:
Silly Goblins

A pack full of Goblin Heroes for your adventures!!

This product includes:
  • Goblin_Alchemist[goblin,monster,hero,alchemist]
  • Goblin_Barbarian[goblin,monster,hero,barbarian,warrior]
  • Goblin_blackguard[goblin,monster,hero,blackguard,antipaladin]
  • Goblin_Cleric[goblin,monster,hero,cleric,priest]
  • Goblin_Cook[goblin,monster,hero,Cook]
  • Goblin_Druid[goblin,monster,hero,druid,animal,caster]
  • Goblin_Duelist[goblin,monster,hero,duelist,swashbuckler]
  • Goblin_fighter[goblin,monster,hero,fighter,knight]
  • Goblin_gunslinger[goblin,monster,hero,gunslinger,pistol]
  • Goblin_Hunter[goblin,monster,hero,archer,hunter,ranger]
  • Goblin_Juggler[goblin,monster,hero,joker,juggler,bard]
  • Goblin_Knight[goblin,monster,hero,fighter,knight]
  • Goblin_Necromancer[goblin,monster,hero,caster,mage,wizard,sorcerer]
  • Goblin_Peasant[goblin,monster,villager,npc,slave,peasant]
  • Goblin_Pirate[goblin,monster,hero,rogue,pirate,sea]
  • Goblin_Princess[goblin,monster,npc,princess,lady,maiden]
  • Goblin_Shooter[goblin,monster,hero,rogue,stealth]
  • Goblin_Slayer[goblin,monster,hero,inquisidor,hunter,pistol,Slayer]
  • Goblin_Sneak[goblin,monster,hero,rogue,stealth]
  • Goblin_Sorcerer[goblin,monster,hero,caster,mage,wizard,sorcerer]
  • Goblin_Vampire[goblin,monster,vampire,undead,bat]
  • Goblin_Wizzard[goblin,monster,hero,caster,mage,wizard,sorcerer]
  • Goblindog[monster,mount,animal,goblin]
  • Goblindog_Saddled[monster,mount,animal,goblin]
  • Goblinsnake[monster,goblin,snake]
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Kevin Doswell
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
